name: Greek Cauliflower Dip
recipeIngredient: 2 large heads cauliflower, cut into florets
3 cups chicken broth, homemade or low-sodium canned
1/8 teaspoon freshly ground pepper, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cauliflower, garlic and chicken broth in a deep saute pan. Bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer. Cover and cook until , about 50 minutes. Drain.
Place the cauliflower and garlic in a food processor. Puree until smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Process until smooth. Serve with crackers.
